productionForms.title: Production Forms
productionForms.description: Forms, documents and tools available for supervisors and production operators

completedMO.title: Report - Completed MO
completedMO.description: Form for reporting completed production tasks (MO). Fill after completing production order.

productionControl.title: Report - Production Control
productionControl.description: Form for reporting production quality control. Contains detailed information about production process and atmospheric conditions.

productionShift.title: Report - Production Shift
productionShift.description: Form for reporting work on production shift. Contains information about employees, products made and other activities.

inventoryForms.title: Inventory Forms
inventoryForms.description: Forms, documents and tools available for warehouse employees

loadingReport.title: Report - Goods Loading
loadingReport.description: Form documenting goods loading process. Contains employee identification, carrier information and vehicle technical condition.

unloadingReport.title: Report - Goods Unloading
unloadingReport.description: Form documenting goods unloading process. Contains employee identification, supplier information and visual goods assessment.

hallDataForms.title: Hall Data Forms
hallDataForms.description: Forms, documents and tools for reporting environmental conditions and machine work

environmentalReport.title: Report - Environmental Conditions
environmentalReport.description: Form for reporting environmental conditions in production hall. Contains measurements of temperature, humidity and other climate parameters.

machineReport.title: Report - Machine Status
machineReport.description: Form for reporting technical status of machines. Contains information about equipment operation, failures and maintenance.

serviceReport.title: Report - Service Inspection
serviceReport.description: Form documenting service inspections of machines and equipment. Contains information about maintenance activities and repairs performed.
